name: Apollo 13.1.0 (LTS)
description:
You control a malfunctioning ship as it is surrounded by endless waves of enemies. Your ship is also constantly losing oxygen. Take care not to lose control of all systems, or run out of oxygen.  Lose key systems, repair the ones you've lost, repeat.

Played in a browser. Made for and submitted to the GMTK Game Jam 2020.

CONTROLS

W, A, S, D - Move and rotate the ship.

Arrow Keys - Expel some of your oxygen supply to move.

Space - Activates and Deactivates your shields. Deactivate just before collisions to deflect enemies and bullets.

Mouse move and click - Aim and fire your turret.

ESC - Pause
